name: Bill and the Unscalable wall
description: Bill and the Unscalable wall is a game made in 3 days in the unity game engine.  In this game you play as Bill, an angry cube trying to scale a wall of doubt, and bring the courage into himself.  The character controller and animations I used came from this: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/templates/systems/2d-flexible-platformer-c...
